remarks: The imaginary part of the logarithm is in ` ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ` . Deduction form of ~ logimcl .  Compare ~ logimclad .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
logimcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
logimcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
logimcld $p |- ( ph -> ( -u _pi < ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) /\ ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) <_ _pi ) ) $.
